salaryExpectations: LKR 80,000 (Graduate Architect) to LKR 700,000+ (Principal Architect in own firm) per month.
futureOutlook: The field is competitive. Architects who embrace sustainable design, green building principles, and modern technologies like BIM will have a distinct advantage. The tourism and luxury real estate sectors are key drivers of demand. Many successful architects eventually establish their own boutique firms.
